quote: Spies are the world's best salespeople because there is no harder sale to make.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the conventional view of espionage and relates it to sales.
suggested_hook: What do spies and top salespeople have in common?

quote: The melody is body language and tone of voice, and the words are the lyrics.
why_clipworthy: It provides a vivid metaphor for understanding communication.
suggested_hook: Why your words might be the least important part of communication.
